com.chute.sdk.v2.api.hearts

Class Hearts

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chute.sdk.v2.api.hearts.Hearts

  • public class Hearts
extends Object
    The Hearts class is a helper class which contains the following methods for manipulating with asset hearts: getting, deleting and creating hearts.

    • Field Summary

      static String TAG

      Gets a number of all hearts associated with an asset inside an album
      static com.dg.libs.rest.HttpRequest heart(android.content.Context context, AlbumModel album, AssetModel asset, com.dg.libs.rest.callbacks.HttpCallback<ResponseModel<HeartModel>> callback)
      Hearts a specific asset inside an album.
      static com.dg.libs.rest.HttpRequest unheart(android.content.Context context, AlbumModel album, AssetModel asset, com.dg.libs.rest.callbacks.HttpCallback<ResponseModel<HeartModel>> callback)
      Removes an existing heart from an asset.The heart will be marked for the current user doing the requests

    • Method Detail

      • heart

        public static com.dg.libs.rest.HttpRequest heart(android.content.Context context,
                                 AlbumModel album,
                                 AssetModel asset,
                                 com.dg.libs.rest.callbacks.HttpCallback<ResponseModel<HeartModel>> callback)
        Hearts a specific asset inside an album. The heart will be marked for the current user committing the requests
        Parameters:
        context - - The application context
        album - - Album that holds the hearted asset
        asset - - Asset to be hearted
        callback - - Instance of HttpCallback interface. If successful, the callback returns ResponseModel
        Returns:
        - HeartRequest

        Gets a number of all hearts associated with an asset inside an album
        Parameters:
        context - - The application context
        album - - Album that holds the hearted asset
        asset - - Hearted asset
        callback - - Instance of HttpCallback interface. If successful, the callback returns ResponseModel

      • unheart

        public static com.dg.libs.rest.HttpRequest unheart(android.content.Context context,
                                   AlbumModel album,
                                   AssetModel asset,
                                   com.dg.libs.rest.callbacks.HttpCallback<ResponseModel<HeartModel>> callback)
        Removes an existing heart from an asset.The heart will be marked for the current user doing the requests
        Parameters:
        context - - The application context
        album - - Album containing the hearted asset
        asset - - Hearted asset
        callback - -Instance of HttpCallback interface. If successful, the callback returns ResponseModel
        Returns:
        - UnheartRequest
